Dear Rik,

Your DMP looks very complete.

One issue needs your attention, under the following section:
"Are there any factors that restrict or prevent the sharing of (some of) the data (e.g. as defined in an agreement with a 3rd party, legal restrictions)? "

No

=> Under data preservation, you mention data from clinical trials. Those data cannot be openly shared by default. The guideline is to "Share as open as possible and closed as necessary"
